entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
